instructions: From the Home screen, swipe up twice to view your apps, then tap Settings . Tap Network & internet > Wi-Fi > Saved networks . Tap on a saved network, then tap FORGET .

From the Home screen, swipe up twice to view your apps, then tap Settings . Tap Network & internet > Wi-Fi . Select from the list of available wireless networks. Enter a password or key if prompted, then tap Connect .
From the Home screen, swipe up twice to view your apps, then tap Settings . Tap Network & internet > Wi-Fi . Tap the switch to turn Wi-Fi on or off.
